page.title: 18CLUBS AND FACILITIES
page.content: The{Women's Institutes}are very active in both villages.The Gorefield branch has recently organised an outing to a local R.A.F. base, and they have also held a disco.The county president attended the May meeting of the {Women's Institute}at Newton;they have also been busy with a charity knit_in and they recently held a Ploughman's Supper and a Fashion Show.One of the biggest events of the year in the region is the{Gorefield Show.}Shire horses provide the main attraction,and there are numerous sideshows and childrens sports.The proceeds help to support major village organisations. The{Village Hall Committee}in Newton ,organises an annual Car Rally, and the{Newton Society,}the{Gorefield {Playing Field Association,}and a{Good {Companions Club. {
